contents.text: Welcome to Mashery, your API management partner powering digital transformation.
To speak with our sales and product team, press 1.
For pricing and quote requests, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a Mashery sales representative.

navigationGoals: Get a custom quote for Mashery’s API management solution.
I need a pricing quote for large-scale API usage next quarter and information on any veterans discount.
Get an enterprise pricing breakdown for 1,000 requests-per-second throughput with a 24/7 uptime SLA on a 12-month contract.
I need a detailed price estimate for your API services.
Request a student discount quote for API access to analyze astrophysics data in my senior research project.

contents.text: For product demos and API trials, press 2.
One moment please, connecting you to our demo specialist.

navigationGoals: Schedule a product demo and trial of the Mashery API platform.
I’d like to schedule a demo of your API for a proof-of-concept project supporting veteran job placement.
Schedule a live demo of the REST API console and request sandbox trial access to test OAuth2 workflows.
I’d like to schedule a trial and see a demo of your API.
Schedule a demo to see how Mashery’s API gateway can integrate with my experimental data pipeline.

contents.text: For support and account services, press 2.
For technical support and API performance issues, press 1.
Please hold while we route your call to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot technical issues causing slow API performance.
I’m seeing slow response times on my API integration and need technical support to troubleshoot.
Troubleshoot elevated p95 latency and intermittent 504 timeouts on my GET /orders endpoint after recent deployment.
I’m getting errors with my API and need technical support.
Troubleshoot high latency errors when pulling live sensor data through the API.

contents.text: For account management and billing inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our account services team.

navigationGoals: Review and update my account billing and payment information.
I want to update my billing details and inquire about applying a veteran discount to my account.
Add a new corporate credit card for billing and retrieve the API usage invoice for last month.
I have a question about my recent invoice and billing.
Update billing details with my university’s purchase order for the API subscription.
